health_discussed_people_names: Hon. Mwaka Bakari, Hon. Fadhili, Hon. Bernard Ogutu, Hon. Charles Kitula, Hon. Ibrahim Omondi, Hon. Tobias Samba, Hon. Shebe Athumani, Hon. Renson Thoya
health_data_challenges: The delay in responding to health issues, concerns about the implementation of solutions, and the need for physical presence of health officials
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: Site visits to assess health facilities, allocation of resources for health infrastructure, and addressing concerns about staff working conditions
health_evidence_base: Public complaints, personal observations, and requests for site visits
